turkish_example_sentence: Onlar ormanda taze mantar bulurlarsa, lezzetli bir yemek pişirecekler.
english_example_sentence: If they find fresh mushrooms in the forest, they will cook a delicious meal.
russian_example_sentence: Если они найдут свежие грибы в лесу, они приготовят вкусное блюдо.
